page.title: 07LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Johnson Fold A survey into the leisure activities revealed that the most popular are gardening,swimming,reading and watching television.Although there is an interest in a variety of outdoor activities there is not widespread support for them.The survey showed that the most popular team participation sports were football and rounders.However the two local leisure centres,Bolton and Horwich were hardly ever used by people on the estate. Most hobby activities were those that could be done in the home. The children seemed to have few personal hobbies but some attend a club organised by a youth group.The local Studio 3 cinema, and the Octagon theatre were rarely visited.
